column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A man thought to be a drug addict broke into a property and attacked people with an ax and a cleaver. The incident occurred at about 2 pm on May 20
column4: 2020 at the National Highway 5 at 8 km Sangkat Chrang Chamres II
column5: Russey Keo District.------According to the information given
column7: the drugged up man was in a confused state. Holding an ax
column8: he knocked on the door of a house
column9: but could not open it. He went to another door
column10: broke in and went inside.------When local people went to intervene
column11: they were attacked by the man and police were called.------The man was arrested and taken to a local health center after he was injured. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
